page.title: 17SAMPFORDS HAMLETS
page.content: In this area there are two hamlets. The first is the hamlet of Tindon End. Here are several examples of large well maintained private houses with a few farm houses as well. One of these large houses is Tindon End Manor. Surrounding all the houses is farm land. Only one road, with two side roads running from it, serves this hamlet. This road is a cul-de-sac and it is necessary to travel into the village of Gt. Sampford to reach any other town. The second hamlet is at Wimbish Green. The houses here are not as big as those at Tindon End. They are well maintained. Some are farm houses. The road which serves this hamlet is also a cul-de-sac. The residents either have to travel to Radwinter or Wimbish, neighbouring villages to reach other towns.
